metadata.title: CVE-2021-42196 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in swftools through 20201222. A NULL pointerdereference exists in the function traits_parse() located in abc.c. Itallows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
